mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, role, name, gender, email, phone) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{role}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password}

SELECT * FROM user
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND role = #{role}
